oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Negro Principals Take the Stand
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; school desegregation; Sugarmon, Russell B.; law;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Article describes Memphis City School desgregation case and the testimony of 26 principals for the plaintiff.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vanderwood, Paul
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Sally Lineback
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: photocopy of newspaper clipping, 8.5 x 11 in.
